title: Arsenal star Hector Bellerin is wanted by Manchester City boss Pep Guardiola this summer
text:
Get Beller-in Arsenal star Hector Bellerin is wanted by Manchester City boss Pep Guardiola this summer 
Barcelona are also looking to resign the 21-year-old who came through at their academy before signing for the Gunners Gossip Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments PEP GUARDIOLA is desperate to bring new life to Manchester City’s ageing defence and is targeting Arsenal star Hector Bellerin. 
According to Mundo Deportivo , Guardiola will face fierce competition from his former club Barcelona as they are also keen on capturing the Spanish full back. Reuters 6 Hector Bellerin is wanted by both Manchester City and Barcelona 
City and Barca will both have to stump up a lot of cash to lure the 21-year-old from the Emirates – after he signed a six-and-a-half-year deal at Arsenal last November. Keep up to date with ALL the Manchester City news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
But with money being no issue for the cash-rich clubs, it means that both teams will fight it out to land his signature. 
Guardiola will be determined to add the young Spain international to his ranks as he has four full backs who are over the age of 30. 
With Gael Clichy (31 years old), Bakary Sagna (34), Alexander Kolarov (31) and Pablo Zabaleta (32) all entering the latter stages of their careers. Reuters Pep Guardiola is looking to rebuild his ageing defence Getty Images Bakary Sagna is the oldest full back at Manchester City, aged 34 Reuters 6 Luis Enrique is keen on bringing Bellerin back to Barcelona 
But something that will work in Barcelona’s favour is the fact that Bellerin progressed through the youth ranks at La Masia from 2003 to 2011 before signing for Arsenal. 
And it would also give the Catalan-born star a chance to return to his home town, where he grew up with his family. 
Despite Bellerin agreeing fresh terms last season, he could leave the Emirates with Arsene Wenger’s future coming into serious doubt. The full back has been listed alongside Alexis Sanchez, Mesut Ozil and Santi Cazorla as potential stars to follow Wenger out of the club. 
But with Guardiola looking to bring in more than one defender, Manchester City have also been linked with Bayern Munich's Juan Bernat and Valencia's Jose Luis Gaya. Reuters Bellerin could leave Arsenal if Arsene Wenger leaves the club in the summer PA:Press Association Guardiola also has his eye on other defenders as he looks to improve City's defence
